responses: you can find 1C company at these addresses: ||Sales: ul. Seleznevskaya 21 ||box 64, 123056 Moscow ||tel.: (+7 495) 2584408 - 7379257 ||fax: (+7 495) 6814407

patterns: i want to know about 1C company
responses: 1C Company ( Фирма '1С' in Russian ) is one of the largest video game development, publishing and distribution studios in Russia,founded in Moscow by Boris Nuraliev in 1991. 1C offers easy-to-use software to companies that do not wish to invest in development.At present, 8000 dealers from 600 cities cooperate with 1C.For more informations, PLease visit our official website : https://1c.ru/eng/title.htm

1C offered services : 1) Enterprise 8 :  Enterprise 8 is a platform for management software development. The platform is a market leader in Russia. The complete suite includes accounting, contact management, stocks, documents, web client and more.You can check this platform here : https://v8.1c.ru .   2) BUSINESS SOFTWARE DEVELOPMENT, SUPPORT AND DISTRIBUTION : 1C delivers flexible , modern and scalable Enterprise system of business automation products.These services are supported by Enterprise 8 platform.  3) EDUCATION AND ENTERTAINMENT SOFTWARE: Educational software developed by 1C includes a series of 1C:Tutor software representing school education lessons of mathematics, the Russian language, physics, chemistry, biology, etc. About entertainment:1 C has released key titles developed by major Russian studios, including Hard Truck and Hard Truck 2 by SoftLab-NSK, Blitzkrieg 1-2, Silent Storm and Heroes of Might and Magic 5 by Nival Interactive and more..

patterns: what are the developed games by 1C?
responses: The division of video games from the 1C Company specializes mainly in the combat flight simulation of WWII . Games series developed by 1C company can be classified into 2 groups : ||1C Maddox Games|| : *IL-2 Sturmovik (2001) *IL-2 Sturmovik: Forgotten Battles (2003) *Pacific Fighters (2004) *IL-2: 1946 (2006) *Theater of War (2007) *IL-2 Sturmovik: Cliffs of Dover (2011)  ||1C Game Studios|| *IL-2 Sturmovik: Great Battles , check the official website of 1C games products to get updated and buy the 1C newest games releases : www.1cpublishing.eu
